The '''''Minecraft Official Novels'''''<ref>[https://archive.org/details/minecraft-franchise-fact-sheet-april-2021/page/n1/mode/2up ''Minecraft Franchise Fact Sheet - April 2021'' (archived)]</ref> are a series of novels for ''[[Minecraft]]''. The novels are written by various authors, and the series has sold a combined fifteen million copies as of January 2025.<ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/20250225051156/https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/768634/minecraft-one-last-quest-by-brandon-hoang/ "The latest original Minecraft novel in the bestselling publishing program–now with over 15 million books in print!"] - ''Minecraft: One Last Quest'' by Brandon Hoàng (archived)</ref>
